p: To determine the effect of the passivation process on the quality of a phosphate coating two low-alloy steel samples of the same size were prepared, see Figure 15. One sample was prepared with the passivation and oiliness process and another sample was prepared with the passivation process only. In the oiliness process, a solution of mineral oil, emulsifying with water (ZWEZ E-4999) was used. The passivating process of the samples was performed in a bath containing zirconium and silicon compounds.
